start.welcome:
👋 Welcome to EasyTrack, {name}!

📊 Track your body measurements easily:
• Choose which measurements to track
• Log your progress regularly
• View your improvement over time

Use /menu to see all available options.
start.error: ❌ Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

add_measurement.no_types:
❌ You haven't added any measurement types yet.

Use "⚙️ Manage Types" to add measurement types first.

manage_types.title: ⚙️ Manage Measurement Types:
manage_types.description: You can add or remove measurement types that you want to track.

add_types.no_available:
✅ You're tracking all available measurement types!

🎯 All predefined types are already in your tracking list
🔧 Your custom types are also already active

💡 Want to track something new?
Create a custom measurement type below!
add_types.error: ❌ Error adding measurement types. Please try again.

custom_types.title: ✨ Create Custom Measurement Type
custom_types.name_prompt:
Please enter the name for your custom measurement type:
Example: 'Forearm', 'Body Temperature', 'Blood Pressure', etc.
custom_types.unit_prompt:
Now enter the unit of measurement:
Examples: 'cm', 'kg', 'inches', '%', 'mmHg', '°C', etc.
custom_types.description_prompt:
Optionally, enter a description for this measurement type:
Example: 'Measurement taken around the forearm at its widest point'

Or click 'Skip Description' to finish.
custom_types.name_too_short: ❌ Name must be at least 2 characters long. Please try again:
custom_types.name_too_long: ❌ Name must be no more than 50 characters long. Please try again:
custom_types.name_exists: ❌ A measurement type with name '{name}' already exists. Please choose a different name:
custom_types.unit_empty: ❌ Unit cannot be empty. Please try again:
custom_types.unit_too_long: ❌ Unit must be no more than 10 characters long. Please try again:
custom_types.description_too_long: ❌ Description must be no more than 200 characters long. Please try again:
